price: Hayatamfaa mali yake, wala alivyo vichuma.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
footnotes: Hayatolindwa na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu mali yake aliyo kuwa nayo, wala cheo chake alicho kichuma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
